title: Dubai offers a 90% discount on commercial licenses for AI and web3 companies
description: TL;DR Breakdown In a bid to solidify its reputation as a major tech hub, Dubai has rolled out an irresistible offer for artificial intelligence (AI) and Web3 businesses in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA) region. The city now promises a whopping 90% discount on commercial licenses, inviting these sectors to make the city ... Read more
